title: Lisa Stansfield - The Moment (2004) [EAC - FLAC] (oan)
description:
The Moment is the sixth solo album by British pop / soul singer
Lisa Stansfield, released on ZTT Records in September 2004 in
the UK, and subsequently distributed in Europe by Edel
International in February 2005. It was re-released, in March 2006,
in a deluxe edition, with gold cover, appropriately entitled The
Moment - Gold Edition, including 2 bonus tracks and an enhanced
CD-ROM section with extra contents.
The 2004 edition includes 11 audio-tracks and 2 videoclips, while
the 2006 edition includes 13 audio tracks and 2 videoclips. 4
singles were taken out the album: "Easier", "Treat Me Like a
Woman" (the two songs were released as one double-A-side
single in the UK only, and separately in some territories), "If I
Hadn't Got You" and "He Touches Me".
